title: The Villainess Does Not Reflect! - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Charismatic Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Demon Lord   Demons   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Lack of Common Sense   Narcissistic Protagonist   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Proactive Protagonist   Reincarnation   Royalty   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 束原ミヤコ
description:
Duchess Lydith Annemaria was 18 years old when her fiancé, the crown prince, broke off their engagement. Then her carriage was involved in an accident, and she found herself brought back in time to the age of 16 by a boy who claimed to be a god.

She doesn't want to change her personality to make the Crown Prince like her. It would be foolish to repeat the same thing over and over again, so, it might be better to reign at the top of the demon tribe and rule over all the human nations.

Lydith makes up her mind. She will make the king of the demon tribe fall in love with her beauty!>
